title: BigFish Games - The Serpent of Isis - New Hidden Object Puzzle -
description:
The Serpent of Isis


In the early 1900`s the legendary artwork, the Serpent of Isis, was stolen at the grand opening 

of the Egypt Museum in Cairo. Originally discovered by your grandfather, you have been searching 

for the missing masterpiece your entire adult life. One day, a mysterious letter arrives 

indicating that the person who possesses the artwork can be found on board the Mont Palu Express. 

Catch the train and solve the ancient mystery!

    * Solve intriguing puzzles
    * Find bonus items to earn extra hints
    * Beautiful locations



System Requirements:
OS: Windows XP/Vista
CPU: 800 Mhz
RAM: 512 MB
DirectX: 7.0
Hard Drive: 111 MB
